tldr: Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to information disclosure. Preview tokens are not properly validated or protected, which can allow unauthorized users to access draft or revision previews. This can lead to exposure of unpublished or sensitive content.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version that falls within the vulnerable range.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `craftcms/cms` library to the patch version.
